values:
<small>


Sometimes I can think the most jealous thoughts.
theres nothing to be jealous bout.


all i can say is im the happiest person alive when im with him
nobody has ever made me feel as good about life/myself as he does


Im putting my heart in his hands and 
hes treating it like its the most precious fragile thing in the world


I have never felt this way about anybody.. 
nobody has ever treated me so right!!


I will post pictures later.
<333 


ps- my baby is sick wit REALLY bad strep throat n tony kept tellin me he knew someone who died from strep.. then we went to Randalls to see him n I brought him a single red rose and he looked so sick :( :(. i hadn't seen him in 2 days n usually we see eachother all day every day.

<small>post a memory of me in the comments. it can be anything you want. then post this to your journal and see what people remember of you.

from <lj user= "_delicate_lisp">

<33

Dont ask to be added if you dont like racial slurrs, swears, Assloads of pictures, and drugs. period. I might give you a second chance if i like you but thats IT. If you fuck up my rules you are off my list.
